deformablemesh.geometry

Class CurvatureCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • deformablemesh.geometry.CurvatureCalculator

  • public class CurvatureCalculator
extends Object
    A class used for calculating curvatures based on "Discrete Differential-Geometry Operators for Triangled 2-Manifolds Mark Meyer, Mathieu Desbrun, Peter Schroeder, and Alan H. Barr

      • calculateAverageCurvature

        public static double calculateAverageCurvature(DeformableMesh3D sharedFaces)
        Calculates the average kappaH value for the whole mesh. kappaH is 1/2 the value of kappa returned from get normal and curvature.
        Parameters:
        sharedFaces -
        Returns:
